#text=Taking a bath can be a very relaxing thing to do especially right before bed .
#text=You can take a bath to clean yourself or just to soak and relax but both can be an enjoyable experience .
#text=This will include a towel for drying off and any personal body supplies such as soaps .
#text=You may want to take a quick shower off first so that your bath water stays clean as you soak .
#text=You will want to make sure the tub is clean first and you might want to wipe the bottom and sides off .
#text=When you are ready for your bath you want to first fill your tub with water using a temperature you find pleasant but make sure you have put the plug in so your water does not drain away .
#text=Its nice to use bubble bath , or bath salts , or even bath oils .
#text=When taking a bath setting a relaxing atmosphere is also nice .
#text=You can turn on some soothing music .
#text=Candle in the room and around the tub are always nice too .
